name: Monster
ability: You have a Minion ability and an Outsider ability.
firstNightReminder: Show the Monster the 'You are' card, then a Minion token and an Outsider token. Mark the Monster with the 'Minion Ability' and 'Outsider Ability' reminders to track which abilities they have.

name: Door
ability: Each night, one player may visit you & ask a yes/no question. If you are good, you answer honestly. If you are evil, you lie. When one Door dies, all Doors die. [+1 Evil Door]
otherNightReminder: Wake one player (if any choose to visit). Point to the Door. That player asks their yes/no question. The Door signals their answer (thumbs up for yes, thumbs down for no). Put both players to sleep. If a Door died tonight, kill all other Doors.

name: Fault
ability: Each night, mark a player. The next night, that player dies. The night after that, that player is revived as a Minion.
otherNightReminder: Point to a player and mark them with 'Marked'. If a player has 'Dies Tonight', they die. Remove the 'Dies Tonight' reminder and add the 'Revives as Minion' reminder. If a player has 'Revives as Minion', revive them and show them a Minion token, then mark them as a Minion in the Grimoire.
flavor: This is my hole. It was made for me.
